Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, poor staff”
Reviews.Author: Unkn0wn
Reviews.Content: supposed arrive 2am unfortunalty arrived delay connection reservation desk employee looked online reservation world nice sleep immediatly woken 8am staff tried door found security lock breakfast ok world wasnt expecting taxis dont hotel returned 7 pm wasnt serviced phoned soon clean towels kept passport 2 days pay bit 4 star plus hotel

Reviews.Title: “Go somewhere else”

Reviews.Content: lords hotel probably ok 1 2 nights spend stopover dubai main objective visit burj observation deck – lucky review plus spacious clean loud party vibes street arrived late night thursday windows soundproof hand looked 1970s hotel packed noisy russians swimming pool sundeck terrace rooftop welcoming mediocre breakfast selection taste servicewise indifferent staff improve impression passports arrival overnight police check reluctant proof passports eventually insisted day real pain passports – 3 times times day special taxis cheap dubai 510 minutes walk dhow dubai creek 20 min nice walk water abra watertaxi stations time dubai look stay
